tree.name: Daniel Gafford
tree.note: Arkansas center, 2019 #38 overall pick by Chicago

assetsGivenUp.name: Richaun Holmes
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Dallas absorbed Holmes from Sacramento using a $17M traded player exception
assetsGivenUp.note: Bowling Green center, undrafted 2015. Also received O-Max Prosper (#24 pick) in same deal.

assetsGivenUp.name: $17M Trade Exception
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Created by sending Davis Bertans and #10 pick to OKC for #12 pick (Dereck Lively)
assetsGivenUp.note: $17M traded player exception generated from the Bertans salary leaving Dallas

assetsGivenUp.name: Davis Bertans
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Washington in the Kristaps Porzingis trade
assetsGivenUp.note: Latvian forward, salary filler in KP deal

assetsGivenUp.name: 2023 DAL 1st Round Pick (#10)
assetsGivenUp.note: Sent to OKC along with Bertans, became #10 pick Cason Wallace
